Package gobblin.data.management.trash

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GobblinProxiedTrash
    Interface for proxy enabled trash.
    GobblinTrash
    Interface for Trash.
    SnapshotCleanupPolicy
    Policy for determining whether a Trash snapshot should be deleted.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncTrash
    Implementation of Trash that deletes files asynchronously and in parallel.
    ImmediateDeletionTrash
    ProxiedTrash implementation that immediately deletes Paths instead of moving them to trash.
    MockTrash
    Mock version of ProxiedTrash for simulating deletions.
    NoopSnapshotCleanupPolicy
    Noop implementation of SnapshotCleanupPolicy.
    ProxiedTrash
    An implementation of Trash that allows deleting files as different users.
    TestTrash
    Implementation of ProxiedTrash to use for testing.
    TestTrash.DeleteOperation
    Abstraction for a delete operation.
    TimeBasedSnapshotCleanupPolicy
    Policy that deletes snapshots if they are older than TimeBasedSnapshotCleanupPolicy.SNAPSHOT_RETENTION_POLICY_MINUTES_KEY minutes.
    Trash
    Flexible implementation of Trash similar to Hadoop trash.
    TrashFactory
    Factory for creating Trash instance.
